Topic.Title: Can the capital letter shortcuts be disabled?

Posts.EditableText: The two I've run into are 'S' for save, and R for something I'm not sure of but seems to just re display the room description. Anyways the question is, is there a way to bypass or disable these so a player can type these capital letters without it completely interrupting their input?

Posts.EditableText: It sounds like you mean the control characters? (Ctrl-S to save and Ctrl-R reloads the page.) I don't know of any way to disable those, as - at least in the desktop player - they're part of the outer window menu.

Posts.EditableText:
Wow. I just tried it. Hitting capital R (shift-R) causes a reload, etc. That's definitely a bug. I don't know of a workaround yet.

(Pixie, are you using 5.6?)

Edit: It's less "capital R" as it is Shift-R. Caps lock works fine for capitals, and Shift-R with caps lock on still causes the bad behavior. So it's definitely a "holding shift key down" problem.
